items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars OBSESSED with this dress!
items.body: Wore this dress to a beach wedding this past weekend and I got countless compliments on it. The colors are extremely beautiful and BRIGHT! The dress is super comfortable and lightweight, which was helpful when it was 100 degrees on the day of the wedding. Fits true to size. Did get a bit wrinkled being shoved in my luggage, but after running a steamer over it quickly, it held up great and fought off wrinkles the rest of the night. Cannot beat the price for such a gorgeous dress! Read more
items.author: Shelby Anderegg

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning quality. Beautiful dress.
items.body: Beautiful high-quality material. The dress is so beautifully made. It does run a little large though so if you are time sensitive in ordering, I would size down one. It’s got good heavy material but not so heavy. It’s very lightweight for spring or fall. It’s got a very flattering cut and came in a bag but absolutely no wrinkles so I believe it’s wrinkle resistant. Read more
items.author: Brandy Thomas

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: Lovely, well fitting dress, but sadly, it had a slight stain or black mark on it so decided to return. I like the color contrast and fit up the dress. Read more
items.author: K

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly Fantastic!
items.body: Honestly shocked at how nicely this fit and how flattering it was. VERY forgiving of lumps n bumps, and the tie at the shoulder allows for a great deal of adjustment and the asymmetry is really nice. The elastic at the waist was at a flattering height (I got a M, I'm 5'7" and about 164lbs) and the fabric is soft and felt kind of dressy. No see though issues with nude colored undergarments. Don't be sad about lack of pockets, if you put anything besides a tissue in them, the dress would sag! Really nice dress!! If you're on the fence, get it! Read more
items.author: A. LaConte

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Such a pretty dress but super see through
items.body: I love this dress but could only give it 3 stars because it is see through. I love everything else about this dress from the color, the one shoulder cut of the dress and the lenght but you can absolutely see everything through this dress. Wearing a slip under this dress will work unless your slip has lace or any other design on it because you will be able to see it. I love the pattern and color of the dress. I love the one shoulder fit of this dress which was the reason I bought the dress. It was such a pretty dress and I was so excited to wear it but I had to come up with a plan on how to make it no so see through. I will make it work because I love everything else about this dress. Read more
items.author: Heidi Smith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress for any occasion!
items.body: I wore this dress to a formal wedding and it was perfect! It was hot and the fabric was light and kept me comfortable with its breathable fabric. I was also amazed that it didn't wrinkle and looked great. I really liked the fabric on the top as it elevated the dress. The one shoulder dress was true to size and was very comfortable. I will be able to wear this dress again with sandals and it will be a great casual look. Read more
items.author: Kelly Cogan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute!
items.body: Very cute wore this to a bridal shower and received so many compliments. Very light and comfortable. Read more
items.author: nicole

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful but didn’t fit me
items.body: The dress and color were gorgeous. The material seemed high quality. The dress fit perfectly except the chest. It was small in some places and large around the neckline. I ended up returning though due to excess material around the neckline that puffed out no matter how I adjusted the dress. It caused an awkward, frumpy appearance on my body. I normally wear L to XL tops and have 38-40DD chest. Read more
items.author: Lauren Chambers

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi One Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi One Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue White, Orange Floral, Dark Blue Orange Floral, Solid Royal Blue, Black/White/Yellow, Black White, Coffee Pink, Coffee, Solid Light Blue, Black White Floral, Rose Red Big Floral, Blue Pink Stripe, Jiang Yellow, Solid Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
